game.name: Astronook
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: An astronomy game where you can explore space from the comfort of your study. Map out constellations, photograph planets and discover the hidden wonders of space.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An astronomy game where you can explore space from the comfort of your study. Map out constellations, photograph planets and discover the hidden wonders of space.
